name: The Hunt - Rebuilt
description: "As you blink the grogginess from your eyes, you remember what's happened and why you are here..."Trapped within a forest of death, a white stag must find his way out before the hunter chasing him gains his prize. That is....unless the forest kills him first.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7,8,Vista, XP Memory: 950 MB RAM Storage: 950 MB available space
